issues.description: The problem specification (including UML and description) defines calculateRemainingOrderNumber() to return an int, but the solution implements it as void (printing output instead of returning a value). This mismatch in return type and behavior can confuse students about the expected method signature and usage.
issues.suggested_fix: Either update the solution to declare calculateRemainingOrderNumber() as returning an int (and return the remaining order count) or adjust the problem specification/UML to define it as void if printing inside the method is intended.
